ComicInfo.Title: Collars & Cuffs
ComicInfo.Summary:
Desert Storms, Part 3: Patra is delivered to the Sultan's harem, where she learns several harsh lessons about life there.
Breaking Up Is Hard To Do: A woman wants to break up with her boyfriend, but doesn't want to lose the sex.
Old Fashioned Book-Learning: Under evaluation, Nikki must ride with her Squad Sergeant as they assist a teacher being menaced by delinquent students.
ANThony: Obsessed with a beautiful tennis player, a lonely man takes a job at her tennis club as a maintenance man and makes a spy hole in the women's shower so he can peep at her.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:27:42. [Issue ID 200785]
